category: Member city/provincial sports association regulations/Article 12 (Function of general meeting)
contents: Article 12 (Functions of the general meeting) The general meeting of the city/provincial sports council deliberates and decides on the following matters. Revised 2021. 2. 4., 2021. 10. 6. 1. Matters regarding the dissolution of the city/provincial sports council and changes to the articles of incorporation 2. Admission, demotion, and expulsion of regular member organizations 3. Deletion 2021. 10. 6. 4. Executives 5. Matters related to the appointment (excluding matters related to the appointment of the Secretary General) and dismissal 5. Matters related to business results and settlement of accounts 6. Other important matters Revised on May 10, 2022
